commit message:
Merge branch 'hotfix/4.7.2' into develop

Conflicts:
BoardGameGeek/AndroidManifest.xml
Replace dual slider with a modern looking range seek bar. Gone are the lines and the steps, but I doubt their usefulness
Fix parcel-ing of HotGame; remove special calculation of h-index when syncing played collection; add seats to players when on 'add, don't edit' mode
Fix crashes in forums, update release notes
Correctly handle trying to delete a play that was already deleted
Correct rating sort descriptions; handle expired session while uploading plays more aggressively
